# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(ci_test LANGUAGES CXX C)

enable_testing()
# target
add_executable(ci_test "")
set_target_properties(ci_test PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "ci_test")
set_target_properties(ci_test PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(ci_test PRIVATE
    include
)
target_include_directories(ci_test PRIVATE
    /home/danielboll/.xmake/packages/g/gtest/1.12.1/77b9096bc4b34d9282f672d36b015ba9/include
)
target_compile_options(ci_test PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(ci_test PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(ci_test PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(ci_test PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(ci_test PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET ci_test PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(ci_test PRIVATE
    gtest_main
    gmock
    gtest
    pthread
)
target_link_directories(ci_test PRIVATE
    /home/danielboll/.xmake/packages/g/gtest/1.12.1/77b9096bc4b34d9282f672d36b015ba9/lib
)
target_link_options(ci_test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(ci_test PRIVATE
    test/main.cpp
)
